items.name: CBaseAnimGraph
items.description_cn: 继承自CBaseModelEntity，用于处理模型实体动画状态和参数控制的基类。
items.common_usage_cn: 控制英雄/单位的动画状态，设置动画参数如朝向目标、布尔开关等。

methods.name: GetGraphParameter
methods.description: Get the value of the given animGraph parameter.
methods.description_cn: 获取指定动画图参数的值。

methods.name: SetGraphLookTarget
methods.description: Pass the desired look target in world space to the graph.
methods.description_cn: 将世界坐标系中的目标注视位置传递给动画图。

methods.name: SetGraphParameter
methods.description: Set the specific param value, type is inferred from the type in script.
methods.description_cn: 设置指定参数的值，参数类型由脚本中的类型推断。

methods.name: SetGraphParameterBool
methods.description: Set the specific param on or off.
methods.description_cn: 设置动画图中指定参数的布尔值

methods.name: SetGraphParameterEnum
methods.description: Pass the enum (int) value to the specified param.
methods.description_cn: 设置动画图中指定参数的枚举值

methods.name: SetGraphParameterFloat
methods.description: Pass the float value to the specified param.
methods.description_cn: 将浮点数值传递给指定参数

methods.name: SetGraphParameterInt
methods.description: Pass the int value to the specified param.
methods.description_cn: 将整型数值传递给指定参数

methods.name: SetGraphParameterVector
methods.description: Pass the vector value to the specified param in the graph.
methods.description_cn: 将向量值传递给图形中的指定参数

items.name: CBaseAnimatingActivity
items.description_cn: 继承自CBaseModelEntity，用于处理带有动画序列的实体基础功能。
items.common_usage_cn: 用于控制游戏单位的动画播放、序列管理和状态检测。

methods.name: ActiveSequenceDuration
methods.description: Returns the duration in seconds of the active sequence.
methods.name_cn: 获取当前序列持续时间
methods.description_cn: 返回当前活动序列的持续时间（秒）。

methods.name: GetCycle
methods.description: Get the cycle of the animation.
methods.description_cn: 获取当前动画的循环进度。

methods.name: GetSequence
methods.description: Returns the name of the active sequence.
methods.description_cn: 返回当前活动序列的名称。

methods.name: IsSequenceFinished
methods.description: Ask whether the main sequence is done playing.
methods.name_cn: 判断序列是否播放完毕
methods.description_cn: 查询主序列是否已完成播放。

methods.name: ResetSequence
methods.description: Sets the active sequence by name, resetting the current cycle.
methods.description_cn: 通过名称设置活动序列，并重置当前循环进度。

methods.name: SequenceDuration
methods.description: Returns the duration in seconds of the given sequence name.

parameters.name: sequenceName
parameters.description_cn: 要查询的动画序列名称。

methods.description_cn: 返回指定序列名称的持续时间（秒）。
methods.returnDescription_cn: 动画序列的持续时间，单位为秒。

methods.name: SetCycle
methods.description: Set the cycle of the animation.

parameters.name: cycle
parameters.description_cn: 动画循环进度值（0.0到1.0之间）。

methods.description_cn: 设置当前动画的循环进度。

methods.name: SetPoseParameter
methods.description: Set the specified pose parameter to the specified value.
methods.description_cn: 将指定的姿态参数设置为给定值。
methods.returnDescription_cn: 返回设置后的实际参数值。

methods.name: SetSequence
methods.description: Sets the active sequence by name, keeping the current cycle.

parameters.name: sequenceName
parameters.description_cn: 要激活的动画序列名称。

methods.description_cn: 按名称设置活动动画序列，同时保持当前循环进度。

methods.name: StopAnimation
methods.description: Stop the current animation by setting playback rate to 0.0.
methods.description_cn: 通过将播放速率设置为0.0来停止当前动画。

items.name: CBaseCombatCharacter
items.description_cn: 所有可进行战斗的单位的基础类，继承自CBaseFlex并扩展了战斗相关功能
items.common_usage_cn: 作为英雄、小兵等战斗单位的基类使用

items.name: CBaseEntity
items.description_cn: 所有Dota2游戏实体的基类，提供最基础的实体操作功能
items.common_usage_cn: 创建/管理游戏中的英雄、单位、物品等所有实体对象的基础操作

methods.signature: EmitSoundParams(soundName: string, pitch: int, volume: float, delay: float): nil
methods.description: Plays/modifies a sound from this entity. changes sound if nPitch and/or flVol or flSoundTime is > 0.
methods.description_cn: 播放或修改该实体的音效。当nPitch和/或flVol或flSoundTime大于0时会改变音效。

methods.description: Get the qangles that this entity is looking at.

methods.description_cn: 首个移动子项

methods.description_cn: 跟随实体

methods.name: GatherCriteria
methods.description: Returns a table containing the criteria that would be used for response queries on this entity. This is the same as the table that is passed to response rule script function callbacks.
methods.description_cn: 返回一个表格，包含该实体用于响应查询的条件

methods.description: Get the local angular velocity - returns a vector of pitch,yaw,roll.
methods.description_cn: 获取局部角速度 - 返回由俯仰角、偏航角、翻滚角组成的向量。

methods.name: SetThink
methods.signature: SetThink(functionName: (entity: CBaseEntity) → float | nil | string, context: table | nil, contextName: string | nil, initialDelay: float | nil): nil
methods.description:
Set a think function on this entity. Uses `CBaseEntity:SetContextThink` internally.
Note: optional parameters can be given in any order.

parameters.name: functionName
parameters.description: If `context` is provided, think function would perform a dynamic lookup on `context` table. Otherwise searches for that function name in caller scope.

parameters.name: contextName
parameters.description: Defaults to `functionName` if it's a string.

methods.description_cn:
为此实体设置思考函数。内部使用`CBaseEntity:SetContextThink`。
注意：可选参数

methods.name: StopThink
methods.description:
Stops thinker created with `CBaseEntity.SetThink`.
Alias for `CBaseEntity:SetContextThink(contextName, nil, 0)`.
methods.description_cn: 停止通过`CBaseEntity.SetThink`创建的思考器。是`CBaseEntity:SetContextThink(contextNam`的别名

items.name: CDOTA_Modifier_Lua_Horizontal_Motion
items.description_cn: 用于实现单位水平方向上的运动控制的Modifier类。当需要让单位沿水平面进行特殊移动时使用。
items.common_usage_cn: 常用于实现英雄的水平位移技能、物品的推拉Modifier/效果等水平面运动控制。

methods.name: ApplyHorizontalMotionController
methods.description: Starts the horizontal motion controller effects for this buff.  Returns true if successful.
methods.description_cn: 为此buff启动水平运动控制器效果。如果成功则返回true。

methods.name: GetPriority
methods.description: Get the priority.
methods.description_cn: 获取优先级数值。

methods.name: OnHorizontalMotionInterrupted
methods.description: Called when the motion gets interrupted.
methods.description_cn: 当运动被中断时调用此方法。

methods.name: SetPriority
methods.description: Set the priority.
methods.description_cn: 设置优先级。

methods.name: UpdateHorizontalMotion
methods.description: Perform any motion from the given interval on the NPC.
methods.description_cn: 在给定时间间隔内对NPC执行任何移动动作。

items.name: CDOTA_Modifier_Lua_Motion_Both
items.description_cn: 该类继承自CDOTA_Modifier_Lua，用于实现单位在水平和垂直方向上的运动控制。
items.common_usage_cn: 常用于实现英雄或单位的特殊移动效果，如跳跃、击飞、滑行等双向运动。

methods.name: ApplyHorizontalMotionController
methods.description: Starts the horizontal motion controller effects for this buff.  Returns true if successful.
methods.description_cn: 为此增益效果启动水平运动控制器。若成功则返回true。

methods.name: ApplyVerticalMotionController
methods.description: Starts the vertical motion controller effects for this buff.  Returns true if successful.
methods.description_cn: 为此增益效果启动垂直运动控制器。若成功则返回true。

methods.name: GetPriority
methods.description: Get the priority.
methods.description_cn: 获取优先级数值。

methods.name: OnHorizontalMotionInterrupted
methods.description: Called when the motion gets interrupted.
methods.description_cn: 当水平移动被中断时调用

methods.name: OnVerticalMotionInterrupted
methods.description: Called when the motion gets interrupted.
methods.description_cn: 当垂直移动被中断时调用

methods.name: SetPriority
methods.description: Set the priority.
methods.description_cn: 设置移动优先级

methods.name: UpdateHorizontalMotion
methods.description: Perform any motion from the given interval on the NPC.
methods.description_cn: 在NPC上执行给定时间间隔内的任何水平移动。

methods.name: UpdateVerticalMotion
methods.description: Perform any motion from the given interval on the NPC.
methods.description_cn: 在NPC上执行给定时间间隔内的任何垂直移动。

items.name: CDOTA_Modifier_Lua_Vertical_Motion
items.description_cn: 用于控制单位垂直方向运动的Lua Modifier类，继承自基础Modifier类
items.common_usage_cn: 实现英雄跳跃、坠落、飞行等垂直运动效果

methods.name: ApplyVerticalMotionController
methods.description: Starts the vertical motion controller effects for this buff.  Returns true if successful.
methods.description_cn: 为此buff启动垂直运动控制器效果。如果成功则返回true。

methods.name: GetMotionPriority
methods.description: Get the priority.
methods.description_cn: 获取优先级。

methods.name: OnVerticalMotionInterrupted
methods.description: Called when the motion gets interrupted.
methods.description_cn: 当运动被中断时调用。

methods.name: SetMotionPriority
methods.description: Set the priority.

methods.description_cn: 生成指定范围内的随机整数

methods.description_cn: 随机百分比

items.name: Convars
items.description_cn: 用于访问和修改Dota2引擎控制台变量的类，主要用于获取或设置游戏运行时参数。
items.common_usage_cn: 在Mod开发中用于读取或修改游戏配置参数，如调试模式开关、游戏规则调整等。

methods.name: GetBool
methods.description: Returns the convar as a boolean flag.
methods.description_cn: 以布尔值形式返回控制台变量的值

methods.name: GetCommandClient
methods.description: Returns the player who issued this console command.
methods.description_cn: 返回执行该控制台命令的玩家

methods.name: GetDOTACommandClient
methods.description: Returns the DOTA player who issued this console command.
methods.description_cn: 返回执行该控制台命令的DOTA玩家

methods.name: GetFloat
methods.description: Returns the convar as a float. May return null if no such convar.
methods.description_cn: 以浮点数形式返回控制台变量值。如果不存在该变量则可能返回null。

methods.name: GetInt
methods.description: Returns the convar as an int. May return null if no such convar.
methods.description_cn: 以整数形式返回控制台变量值。如果不存在该变量则可能返回null。

methods.name: GetStr
methods.description: Returns the convar as a string. May return null if no such convar.
methods.description_cn: 以字符串形式返回控制台变量值。如果不存在该变量则可能返回null。

methods.name: RegisterCommand
methods.signature: RegisterCommand(name: string, callback: (name: string, ...args: [string]) → nil, helpString: string, flags: ConVarFlags): nil
methods.description: Register a console command.
methods.description_cn: 注册一个控制台命令

methods.name: RegisterConvar
methods.signature: RegisterConvar(name: string, defaultValue: string, helpString: string, flags: ConVarFlags): nil
methods.description: Register a new console variable.
methods.description_cn: 注册一个新的控制台变量

methods.name: SetBool
methods.description: Sets the value of the convar to the bool.
methods.description_cn: 将控制台变量的值设置为布尔类型

methods.name: SetFloat
methods.description: Sets the value of the convar to the float.
methods.description_cn: 将控制台变量的值设置为浮点数

methods.name: SetInt
methods.description: Sets the value of the convar to the int.
methods.description_cn: 将控制台变量的值设置为整型数

methods.name: SetStr
methods.description: Sets the value of the convar to the string.
methods.description_cn: 将控制台变量的值设置为字符串

items.name: GlobalSys
items.description_cn: 提供对命令行参数的访问功能，用于读取启动Dota2时传入的参数值。
items.common_usage_cn: 在Mod开发中读取自定义命令行参数配置

methods.name: CommandLineCheck
methods.description: Returns true if the command line param was used, otherwise false.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description_cn: 要检查的命令行参数名称

methods.description_cn: 如果使用了命令行参数则返回true，否则返回false。

methods.name: CommandLineFloat
methods.description: Returns the command line param as a float.
methods.description_cn: 将命令行参数作为浮点数返回。

methods.name: CommandLineInt
methods.description: Returns the command line param as an int.
methods.description_cn: 将命令行参数作为整数返回。

methods.name: CommandLineStr
methods.description: Returns the command line param as a string.
methods.description_cn: 以字符串形式返回命令行参数。

items.name: GridNav
items.description_cn: 提供与Dota2地图网格导航相关的功能，用于处理单位移动路径和地形交互。
items.common_usage_cn: 路径查找、寻路系统、地形障碍物处理、树木破坏检测

methods.name: CanFindPath
methods.description: Determine if it is possible to reach the specified end point from the specified start point. bool.
methods.description_cn: 判断是否可以从指定的起点到达指定的终点。返回布尔值。

methods.name: DestroyTreesAroundPoint
methods.signature: DestroyTreesAroundPoint(arg1: Vector, arg2: float, arg3: bool): nil
methods.description: Destroy all trees in the area(vPosition, flRadius, bFullCollision.

parameters.name: arg3
parameters.description_cn: 是否启用完全碰撞检测

methods.description_cn: 摧毁区域内所有树木（坐标点，半径范围，完全碰撞检测）。

methods.name: FindPathLength
methods.description: Find a path between the two points an return the length of the path. If there is not a path between the points the returned value will be -1.
methods.description_cn: 计算两点间可行路径的长度（若无路径则返回失败）。

methods.name: GetAllTreesAroundPoint
methods.signature: GetAllTreesAroundPoint(position: Vector, radius: float, fullCollision: bool): [CDOTA_MapTree]
methods.description: Returns a table full of tree HSCRIPTS.

parameters.name: fullCollision
parameters.description_cn: 是否考虑完整碰撞体积

methods.description_cn: 返回一个包含所有树HSCRIPTS的表格

methods.name: GridPosToWorldCenterX
methods.description: Get the X position of the center of a given X index.
methods.name_cn: 网格X坐标转世界中心X坐标
methods.description_cn: 获取给定X索引对应的世界中心X坐标

methods.name: GridPosToWorldCenterY
methods.description: Get the Y position of the center of a given Y index.
methods.name_cn: 网格Y坐标转世界中心Y坐标
methods.description_cn: 获取给定Y索引对应的世界中心Y坐标

methods.name: IsBlocked
methods.description: Checks whether the given position is blocked.
methods.description_cn: 检查给定位置是否被阻挡。

methods.name: IsNearbyTree
methods.signature: IsNearbyTree(position: Vector, radius: float, checkFullTreeRadius: bool): bool
methods.description: Checks whether there are any trees overlapping the given point.

parameters.name: checkFullTreeRadius
parameters.description_cn: 是否检查完整树木半径

methods.description_cn: 检查给定点周围是否有树木重叠。

methods.name: IsTraversable
methods.description: Checks whether the given position is traversable.
methods.description_cn: 检查给定位置是否可通行。

methods.name: RegrowAllTrees
methods.description: Causes all trees in the map to regrow.
methods.description_cn: 使地图上所有树木重新生长。

methods.name: WorldToGridPosX
methods.description: Get the X index of a given world X position.
methods.description_cn: 获取给定世界X坐标对应的网格X索引。

methods.name: WorldToGridPosY
methods.description: Get the Y index of a given world Y position.
methods.description_cn: 获取给定世界Y坐标对应的网格Y索引。

items.name: ProjectileManager
items.description_cn: 用于创建和管理游戏中的各种投射物效果，包括线性投射物和追踪投射物。
items.common_usage_cn: 创建技能效果如英雄的远程攻击、法术弹道，或物品的投射效果。

methods.name: ChangeTrackingProjectileSpeed
methods.description: Update speed.
methods.description_cn: 改变追踪弹道的飞行速度

methods.name: CreateLinearProjectile
methods.description: Creates a linear projectile and returns the projectile ID.
methods.description_cn: 创建直线飞行的弹道

methods.name: CreateTrackingProjectile
methods.description: Creates a tracking projectile.
methods.description_cn: 创建追踪目标的弹道

methods.name: DestroyLinearProjectile
methods.description: Destroys the linear projectile matching the argument ID.
methods.description_cn: 销毁与指定ID匹配的线性投射物。

methods.name: DestroyTrackingProjectile
methods.description: Destroy a tracking projectile early.
methods.description_cn: 提前销毁一个追踪投射物。

methods.name: GetLinearProjectileLocation
methods.description: Returns current location of projectile.
methods.description_cn: 返回投射物的当前位置。

methods.name: GetLinearProjectileRadius
methods.description: Returns current radius of projectile.
methods.description_cn: 返回投射物的当前半径

methods.name: GetLinearProjectileVelocity
methods.description: Returns a vector representing the current velocity of the projectile.
methods.description_cn: 返回表示投射物当前速度的向量

methods.name: GetTrackingProjectileLocation
methods.description: Returns current location of projectile.
methods.description_cn: 返回投射物的当前位置

methods.name: IsValidProjectile
methods.description: Is this a valid projectile?
methods.description_cn: 判断该弹道是否有效

methods.name: ProjectileDodge
methods.description: Makes the specified unit dodge projectiles.
methods.description_cn: 使指定单位躲避弹道

methods.name: UpdateLinearProjectileDirection
methods.signature: UpdateLinearProjectileDirection(projectile: ProjectileID, direction: Vector, speed: float): nil
methods.description: Update velocity.
methods.description_cn: 更新弹道速度和方向

items.name: QAngle
items.description_cn: QAngle类用于表示三维空间中的角度，包含俯仰、偏航和滚转三个分量。常用于控制单位朝向、摄像机角度等三维空间旋转操作。
items.common_usage_cn: 设置英雄朝向、调整摄像机视角、计算投射物发射方向

methods.name: __add
methods.description: Overloaded +. Adds angles together.
methods.description_cn: 重载+运算符。将两个角度相加。

methods.name: __eq
methods.description: Overloaded ==. Tests for Equality.
methods.description_cn: 重载==运算符。测试两个角度是否相等。

methods.name: __tostring
methods.description: Overloaded .. Converts the QAngles to strings.
methods.description_cn: 重载..运算符。将QAngles类型转换为字符串。

methods.name: Forward
methods.description: Returns the forward vector.
methods.description_cn: 返回前向向量。

methods.name: Left
methods.description: Returns the left vector.
methods.description_cn: 返回左向量。

methods.name: Up
methods.description: Returns the up vector.
methods.description_cn: 返回上向量。

items.name: SteamInfo
items.description_cn: 提供与Steam平台相关的信息查询功能
items.common_usage_cn: 用于判断当前游戏是否运行在Steam公共服务器环境

methods.name: IsPublicUniverse
methods.description: Is the script connected to the public Steam universe.
methods.description_cn: 检查脚本是否连接到公共Steam宇宙。

items.name: Uint64
items.description_cn: 支持二进制操作的64位无符号整数类，用于处理大数运算和位操作。
items.common_usage_cn: 常用于处理Dota2中的ID系统、掩码计算和大数值运算场景。

methods.name: __eq
methods.description_cn: 相等运算

methods.name: __tostring
methods.description: Overloaded .. Converts Uint64s to strings.
methods.description_cn: 重载运算符 .. 将Uint64转换为字符串

methods.name: BitwiseAnd
methods.description: Performs bitwise AND between two integers.
methods.description_cn: 对两个整数执行按位与运算

methods.name: BitwiseOr
methods.description: Performs bitwise OR between two integers.
methods.description_cn: 对两个整数执行按位或运算

methods.name: BitwiseXor
methods.description: Performs bitwise XOR between two integers.
methods.description_cn: 对两个整数执行按位异或运算

methods.name: BitwiseNot
methods.description: Performs bitwise NOT.
methods.description_cn: 执行按位非运算

methods.name: SetBit
methods.description: Sets the specified bit.
methods.description_cn: 设置指定的位。

methods.name: ClearBit
methods.description: Clears the specified bit.
methods.description_cn: 清除指定的位。

methods.name: IsBitSet
methods.description: Checks if bit is set.
methods.description_cn: 检查位是否被设置。

methods.name: ToggleBit
methods.description: Toggles the specified bit.
methods.description_cn: 切换指定的位状态。

methods.name: ToHexString
methods.description: Returns a hexadecimal string representation of the integer.
methods.description_cn: 返回该整数的十六进制字符串表示形式。

items.name: Vector
items.description_cn: 用于表示和处理3D空间中的向量数据，常用于单位位置、方向计算等场景。
items.common_usage_cn: 计算英雄移动方向、技能施法范围、碰撞检测等3D空间操作

methods.name: __add
methods.description: Overloaded +. Adds vectors together.
methods.description_cn: 重载的+运算符。用于向量相加。

methods.name: __div
methods.description: Overloaded /. Divides vectors.
methods.description_cn: 重载的/运算符。用于向量相除。

methods.name: __eq
methods.description: Overloaded ==. Tests for Equality.
methods.description_cn: 重载的==运算符。用于测试向量是否相等。

methods.name: __len
methods.description: Overloaded # returns the length of the vector.
methods.description_cn: 重载的#运算符，返回向量的长度。

methods.name: __mul
methods.description: Overloaded * returns the vectors multiplied together. Can also be used to multiply with scalars.

parameters.name: b
parameters.description_cn: 乘数，可以是另一个向量或标量值

methods.description_cn: 重载的*运算符，返回向量相乘的结果。也可以用于向量与标量的乘法。

methods.name: __sub
methods.description: Overloaded -. Subtracts vectors.
methods.description_cn: 重载的-运算符，用于向量相减。

methods.name: __tostring
methods.description: Overloaded .. Converts vectors to strings.
methods.description_cn: 重载的..运算符。将向量转换为字符串。

methods.name: __unm
methods.description: Overloaded - operator. Reverses the vector.
methods.description_cn: 重载的-运算符。反转向量方向。

methods.name: Cross
methods.description: Cross product of two vectors.
methods.description_cn: 两个向量的叉积运算。

methods.name: Dot
methods.description: Dot product of two vectors.
methods.description_cn: 两个向量的点积运算

methods.name: Length
methods.description: Length of the Vector.
methods.description_cn: 计算向量的模长

methods.name: Length2D
methods.description: Length of the Vector in the XY plane.
methods.description_cn: 在XY平面上计算向量的模长

methods.name: Normalized
methods.description: Returns the vector normalized.
methods.description_cn: 返回标准化后的向量。

methods.name: Lerp
methods.description:
Linearly interpolates between two vectors.
This is most commonly used to find a point some fraction of the way along a line between two endpoints.
Same as `this + (b - this) * t`.
methods.description_cn:
在两个向量之间进行线性插值。
这通常用于找到某个比例的点。
